FIELDS.title: Arrive at Haneda Airport
FIELDS.subtitle: Yay Japan!

FIELDS.title: Check into Ginza Bay Capsule Hotel
FIELDS.subtitle: Ginza is an area in Tokyo with a lot of shopping

FIELDS.title: Explore Modern Tokyo
FIELDS.subtitle: Shinjuku

FIELDS.title: Explore Tokyo's Nightlife
FIELDS.subtitle: Akihabara and Shinjuku. Maid Cafe and theme restaurants.

FIELDS.title: Check out the temple
FIELDS.subtitle: Asakusa

FIELDS.title: Edo Museum or the Onsen Theme Park
FIELDS.subtitle: Onsen means natural hotspring

FIELDS.title: Let's go to Mount Fuji
FIELDS.subtitle: Take the train from Tokyo

FIELDS.title: Check into Asafuji Ryokan
FIELDS.subtitle: Must check in by 2100. Pickup service from and to the Kawaguchiko Station

FIELDS.title: Take lots of pictures of Mt. Fuji.
FIELDS.subtitle: Lots of pictures.

FIELDS.title: Depart for Kyoto.
FIELDS.subtitle: Take Shinkansen (Bullet Train).

FIELDS.title: Check into the Kyoto Guesthouse Lantern in Gion.
FIELDS.subtitle: Gion is one of the Geisha Districts in Kyoto.

FIELDS.title: Explore Gion.
FIELDS.subtitle: Eat at ICHI, Tsujiri Kyotomise (Matcha dessert), Hideotako (Takoyaji). check out Ishibe Koji (the alley).

FIELDS.title: Explore Downtown Kyoto.
FIELDS.subtitle: Nishiki Market. Pontocho Alley (another Geisha District)

FIELDS.title: Explore Temples in Northern Higashiyama.
FIELDS.subtitle: Nanzenji Temple, the Philosopher's Path

FIELDS.title: Explore Temples in Northern Higashiyama.
FIELDS.subtitle: Nanzenji Temple, the Philosopher's Path

FIELDS.title: Go to the best shrine in Kyoto
FIELDS.subtitle: Fushimi-Inari-Taisha Shrine

FIELDS.title: Central Tokyo - visit Nijo Castle
FIELDS.subtitle: Central Tokyo also has Shimogamo-jinja shrine (second best shrine)

FIELDS.title: Arayshiyama Bamboo Forest
FIELDS.subtitle: Near the Arashiyama monkey park. Also lots of temples to explore there.

FIELDS.title: Visit Northwest Kyoto
FIELDS.subtitle: Kinkakuji Temple (the golden paviolion). Ryoanji Temple (Famous Rock Garden)

FIELDS.title: Leave for Koyasan
FIELDS.subtitle: Gotta go to Osaka first, then take a bus to Koyasan.

FIELDS.title: Leave for Koyasan
FIELDS.subtitle: Gotta go to Osaka first, then take a bus to Koyasan.

FIELDS.title: Check in to Fudou-in (temple lodging or Shukubo)
FIELDS.subtitle: They offer dinner and breakfast. They have a rock garden.

FIELDS.title: Explore and hike around in Koyasan
FIELDS.subtitle: The whole mountain is full of temples.

FIELDS.title: Go Home!
FIELDS.subtitle: Flight leaves from Osaka KIX at 1615. Take the bus back to Osaka from Koyasan.
